metadata.name: Run Once Task Execution as Configured in Registry
metadata.comment: This rule detects the execution of Run Once task as configured in the registry

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\runonce.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('run once wrapper') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/alternateshellstartup')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/r')))

output.summary: This rule detects the execution of Run Once task as configured in the registry
